title: TVS Motor launches new variant of iQube priced at Rs 94,999
description: TVS Motor Company launched a new variant of the TVS iQube with a 2.2 kWh battery priced at Rs 94,999 (Bengaluru ex-showroom). The new model has a top speed of 75 kmph, 950W charger, and two-hour charging time. The vehicle includes a 5-inch color TFT screen, various alerts and navigation, and 30-liter storage. Additionally, the TVS iQube ST with 3.4 kWh and 5.1 kWh variants is now available for delivery nationwide.
